sections.title: Accessing GynoSMART Services
ONLINE: Accessing GynoSMART Service on TELEGRAM (USSD COMMAND)
sections.content:
**/Register**
**\*gs\*reg\*PhoneNo\*Surname*OtherNames#  **

\
**/ClockIN **(Calculate menstruation and ovulation dates with data saved to users profile)  

**\*gs\*clock\*PhoneNo\*LMP*Cycle#** (if Menstrual Cycle is known)  \
NOTE LMP i.e. date of Last Menstrual Cycle should be entered as ddMMyyyy, e.g. Enter 01101960 for October 1, 1960.  

OR  

**\*gs\*clock\*PhoneNo\*LMP#** (If Menstrual Cycle is not known).  \
NOTE LMP i.e. date of Last Menstrual Cycle should be entered as ddMMyyyy.  

**/GynoCalc **(Calculate menstruation and ovulation dates only. Data will not be logged to a profile)  

**\*gs\*calc\*LMP\*Cycle# **(If Menstrual Cycle is known).   \
NOTE: LMP i.e. date of Last Menstrual Cycle should be entered as ddMMyyyy.  

**\*gs\*calc*LMP# (**If Menstrual Cycle is not known).\
NOTE: LMP i.e. date of Last Menstrual Cycle should be entered as ddMMyyyy.  

**/Close** - my GynoSMART account:\
**\*gs\*close*PhoneNo#  **

**/Link **- my GynoSMART profile to a Telegram account (Personal or third party)\
**\*gs\*link*PhoneNo#**

sections.title: OFFLINE: Accessing GynoSMART Service via SMS
sections.content:
USSD Commands are the only tools available to access the limited yet crucial bits of GynoSMART service via SMS. **/Registration** \*gs\*reg\*Surname\*OtherNames#

**/ClockIN** (Calculate menstruation and ovulation dates with data saved to users profile) \*gs\*clock\*LMP\*Cycle# (if Menstrual Cycle is known) NOTE: LMP i.e. date of Last Menstrual Cycle should be entered as ddMMyyyy. OR \*gs\*clock*LMP# (If Menstrual Cycle is not known). NOTE: LMP i.e. date of Last Menstrual Cycle should be entered as ddMMyyyy.

/GynoCalc (Calculate menstruation and ovulation dates only. Data will not be logged to a profile) \*gs\*calc\*LMP\*Cycle# (If Menstrual Cycle is known). NOTE: LMP i.e. date of Last Menstrual Cycle should be entered as ddMMyyyy. \*gs\*calc*LMP# (If Menstrual Cycle is not known). NOTE: LMP i.e. date of Last Menstrual Cycle should be entered as ddMMyyyy.
